Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 46th overall pick, by Lynchburg in 1967...
Injured on 5/5/1967 with a Bruised Jaw, out for one week...
Injured on 6/20/1967 with a Inflamed Hamstring Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 8/9/1968 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 4/17/1970 with a Sprained Ankle, out for 4 days...
Injured on 8/14/1971 with a Bruised Ankle, out for 6 days...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 5/1/1973, off Ross Jones (Ash)...
Signed as a free agent by Pontiac on 2/2/1979 to a 2-year deal worth $414,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Plum Grove on 2/9/1981 to a 4-year deal worth $685,556 per year...
Traded from Plum Grove to New Jersey on 4/15/1981 (Going to NJ: 1B A. Rosario. Going to PG: SS S. Alvarado, P A. Pedroza)...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Columbus on 4/13/1982...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Pittsburgh on 6/16/1983...
